segments.text: The woman is so focused on drying that plate, it’s almost comical.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t noticed the water overflowing all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, and she’s completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll ever realize what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far to reach the cookie jar, and the stool is barely holding him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, just waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I’m watching a scene from a cartoon, it’s so absurd.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to cause so much damage if it keeps flowing like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole situation is both funny and frustrating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but laugh at how ridiculous it all is.
segments.speaker: PAR
